summary:
This mod will add a Petersen Type K inspired bastardsword to the forge. No requirements, just smith it and start whacking!
Requested by Dragosani196.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ghkCJ.png[/IMG]
Description
===========
This mod will add a new Bastardsword to the forge inspired by the Petersen Type K Sword.
Pro\'s: Can serve as a quick 2 hander with lower than average damage. Con\'s: As a 1 hander, it\'s slower than average, but with a higher damage output.
It is craftable in both 1-handed and 2-handed. Crafting the weapon does not require any perk.
the 1 hander can be \"reforged\" into a 2 hander for free and vice versa. even when it\'s already been tempered. (the reforged blade wont be tempered. So choose wisely!)

Now with optional brown and black leather!

Feature!
====================
[youtube]UGPhsD29kAo[/youtube]

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
None so far.

History
=======
v1 - Initial release
v1.0a - optional brown leather patch

Contact
=======
Right here on the Nexus.

Credits
=======
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim and the CK.
Thanks to The Nexus.com for the great service they provide.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.
Thanks to Dragosani196 for requesting this weapon.

Tools Used
==========
7-Zip - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=15579
Blender - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=12248
GIMP - http://www.tesnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=14920
NIFSkope - http://niftools.sourceforge.net/wiki/NifSkope
Readme Generator - http://HammondsLegacy.com/obmm/tools_readme_generator1.asp

Licensing/Legal
===============
The contents of this mod can only be used after obtaining permission from me.
If you like to weapon, get it from my resource: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12087 

Related
===============
Looking for a fancy weapon to include in your new mod?
Look no further! Check out my
[size=\"3\"][color=\"#8B0000\"][url=\"http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=12087\"][img]http://i.imgur.com/w43aI.png[/img][/url][/color][/size]
No permission needed, models and textures included in every download!
author: Urwy
